test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-dateTimealt-1
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-dateTime" function As per example 1 (for this function) of the F&O specs

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-dateTimealt-2
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-dateTime" function As per example 2 (for this function) of the F&O specs.

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-dateTimealt-3
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-dateTime" function As per example 3 (for this function) of the F&O specs. Use the fn:count function to avoid empty file.

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-dateTimealt-4
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-dateTime" function uses as part of a numeric-less-than expression (le operator).

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-dateTimealt-5
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-dateTime" function using the empty sequence as an argument. Use count function to avoid empty file.

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-dateTimealt-6
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-dateTime" function that returns dayTimeDuration of 0.

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-dateTimealt-7
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-dateTime" function that evaluates a timezone of "-00:00".

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-dateTimealt-8
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-dateTime" function as part of a "+" expression.

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-dateTimealt-9
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-dateTime" function as part of a "-" expression.

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-dateTimealt-10
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-dateTime" function as an argument to the "min" function.

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-dateTimealt-11
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-dateTime" function as part of a "div" expression.

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-dateTimealt-12
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-dateTime" function as an argument to the "fn:number" function. Return NaN.

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-dateTimealt-13
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-dateTime" function as as an argument to an "fn:max" function.

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-dateTimealt-14
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-dateTime" function as an argument to the "fn:string" function

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-dateTimealt-15
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-dateTime" function as part of an "and" expression. Uses the "fn:string" function to account for new EBV rules.

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-dateTimealt-16
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-dateTime" function as part of a "numeric-equal" expression (eq operator)

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-dateTimealt-17
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-dateTime" function as part of a "numeric-equal" expression (ne operator)

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-dateTimealt-18
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-dateTime" function as part of a "numeric-equal" expression (le operator)

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-dateTimealt-19
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-dateTime" function as part of a "numeric-equal" expression (ge operator)

test-case.name: fn-timezone-from-dateTimealt-20
test-case.description: Evaluates The "timezone-from-dateTime" function as part of an "or" expression. Uses the "fn:string" function to account for new EBV rules.

test-case.name: K-TimezoneFromDateTimeFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `timezone-from-dateTime()`.

test-case.name: K-TimezoneFromDateTimeFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `timezone-from-dateTime((), "Wrong param")`.

test-case.name: K-TimezoneFromDateTimeFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(timezone-from-dateTime(()))`.

test-case.name: K-TimezoneFromDateTimeFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `timezone-from-dateTime(()) instance of xs:dayTimeDuration?`.

test-case.name: K-TimezoneFromDateTimeFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `timezone-from-dateTime(xs:dateTime("2004-10-12T23:43:12Z")) eq xs:dayTimeDuration("PT0S")`.

test-case.name: K-TimezoneFromDateTimeFunc-6
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `timezone-from-dateTime(xs:dateTime("2004-10-12T23:43:12-08:23")) eq xs:dayTimeDuration("-PT8H23M")`.

test-case.name: K-TimezoneFromDateTimeFunc-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(timezone-from-dateTime(xs:dateTime("2004-12-10T23:43:41.965")))`.
